attributes.action: Can we have Fair law to all parents? Change Family law as like criminal justice?
attributes.additional_details:
Attended family court 98% NO evidences!
Attend criminal court hearing 100% they will asked for fact evidences, they will research, they will investigate, they study it etc...before making decision! 
Few Facebook group has set up of this matter that babies has been remove without fact evidence!

Please think of this petition as your babies, grandchildren, nephew, neices etc.. That has been remove or force adaptation without fact evidences.

Is family law is Fair? How can be fair without evidence?
attributes.background:
Let start with question to ourself what rely we want as British people for sake of our precious innocent kids & family & for Great Britain!
1) Do we want law that can judge you without fact evidence?
2) Or do we want law base in just words?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/188451
